resources.string: Imenyu yokufinyelela inikezela ngemenyu enkulu esesikrinini ukuze ulawule idivayisi yakho. Ungakhiya idivayisi yakho, ulawule ivolumu nokukhanya, uthathe izithombe-skrini, nokuningi.

Indlela yokusebenzisa okuthi Khetha ukuze ukhulume
Qala okuthi Khetha ukuze ukhulume:
• Thepha into ethile, njengombhalo noma isithombe
• Hudula umunwe wakho kuso sonke isikrini ukukhetha izinto eziningi
• Thepha okuthi Dlala ukuze uzwe yonke into esesikrinini
• Khetha umbhalo ovela ngaphakathi kokubuka Kwekhamera
Thepha izinto ezithile esikrinini sakho ukuze uzizwe zifundwa noma zichazwa ngokuphimisela

Ungayisebenzisa kanjani i-TalkBack
• Swayipha ngakwesokudla noma kwesobunxele ukuze uhambe phakathi kwezinto
• Thepha kabili ukuze usebenzise into
• Hudula iminwe emi-2 ukuze uskrole

Ungayivala kanjani -i-TalkBack
1. KumaSethingi, thepha okuthi Sebenzisa i-TalkBack. Kuzoba nohlaka. Thepha kabili kulo.
2. Kumyalezo wokuqinisekisa, thepha okuthi Misa.Kuzoba khona uhlaka. Thepha kabili kulo.
I-Talkback inikeza impendulo ekhulunywayo ukuze usebenzise idivayisi yakho ngaphandle kokubheka isikrini. I-TalkBack ingaba wusizo kubantu abanobunzima bokubona isikrini.
